SEARCH
Package model

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
model.Product
model.Pizza
public class Pizza extends Product
Represents a Pizza, which is a type of Product.

This class includes details about the pizza's size and its ingredients, along with the inherited properties from the Product class.

Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(int id, String name, double price, List<Ingredient> ingredients, String size)
      Constructs a Pizza with the specified id, name, price, ingredients, and size.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the pizza
      name - the name of the pizza
      price - the price of the pizza
      ingredients - the list of ingredients in the pizza
      size - the size of the pizza as a string

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this pizza to the specified object for equality. Two pizzas are considered equal if their ids, names, sizes, and ingredients are the same.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Product
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
